title: Murder on the dance floor (July 2006)
brief_description: A blood chilling murder mystery set at a high school formal. This green screen workshop was produced as part of the G.A.T.E.ways (gifted and talented education) program for kids. The year 6 students learnt scripting, production and performance skills using virtual set technology.
